mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.estados_idEstado, i.nombre, i.descripcion, i.fechaCreacion, i.area, i.palabrasclave, u.documento as user_documento, u.nombre as user_nombre, u.area as user_area, u.telefono as user_telefono, u.correo as user_correo, u.rol as user_rol FROM iniciativas as i,usuarios as u WHERE u.documento = i.usuarios_documento;

SELECT i.id, i.estados_idEstado, i.nombre, i.descripcion, i.fechaCreacion, i.area, i.palabrasclave, u.documento as user_documento, u.nombre as user_nombre, u.area as user_area, u.telefono as user_telefono, u.correo as user_correo, u.rol as user_rol, (select count(*) from intereses join iniciativas on intereses.iniciativa_documento = iniciativas.id where intereses.voto=true and i.id=iniciativas.id) as votos FROM iniciativas as i join usuarios as u on u.documento = i.usuarios_documento left join intereses as inte on i.id=inte.Iniciativa_documento
